content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When business conflicts arise from our close, personal relationships, we address and resolve them so that our duties to EPAM, our business judgment, and our decision-making are not improperly influenced.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal relationships that may require such action include marital, family, romantic, and similarly close personal relationships.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You have an obligation to raise, address, and remove yourself and resolve business conflicts from such situations, for example:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Supervisory and management relationships where you influence hiring, assignment, performance assessment, promotion, compensation or other features of employment of a person with whom you have a marital, family, romantic or similarly close personal relationship;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM business decisions you participate in with another entity where you have a marital, family, romantic or similarly close personal relationship with a decision-maker there.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are aware of such circumstances, you are required to contact People Management or the Chief Compliance Officer, to determine whether a conflict of interest issue exists, and if so, options to address the actual or potential conflict. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
